subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Women
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn, the first American woman to win skiing’s overall World Cup title in a quarter century, finished ninth in the season-opening giant slalom on the Rettenbach glacier in Sölden, Austria.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn, the first American woman to win skiing’s overall World Cup title in a quarter century, finished ninth in the season-opening giant slalom on the Rettenbach glacier in Sölden, Austria.
